Issue.creator: diestrin
Issue.summary: RAFT Orderer crash after multiple attempts to connect to other orderers
Issue.description: ERRO 32d Failed to send StepRequest to 2, because: connection to 2(orderer2.fakeizh-testvin.svc.cluster.local:30292) is in state CONNECTING channel=testiiy-sys-channel node=1{code} it crashes the server with the following error logs {code} 2019-06-19 08:22:23.225 UTC grpc watcher -> DEBU 322 ccResolverWrapper: sending new addresses to cc: {orderer2.fakeizh-testvin.svc.cluster.local:30292 0 } 2019-06-19 08:22:23.225 UTC grpc switchBalancer -> DEBU 323 ClientConn switching balancer to "pick_first" 2019-06-19 08:22:23.225 UTC grpc HandleSubConnStateChange -> DEBU 324 pickfirstBalancer: HandleSubConnStateChange: 0xc000014760, CONNECTING 2019-06-19 08:22:23.240 UTC orderer.consensus.etcdraft run -> INFO 325 This node is picked to
